summary: A simple retex of the Battlemage Armor by Sword13.
descriptionHtml:
They're finally here! New colors for Sword13's Battlemage Armor!

This is just a basic recolor mod, featuring purple, red and silver to replace the original color. Make sure you have the original mod installed first, then download and install this mod. [color=green]Installing via Nexus Mod Manager is highly recommended for ease![/color]

Requires Sword13's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21181/]Battlemage Armor[/url].

[u]Version History:[/u]
[i]1.1[/i]
Released as an all in one installer, just download using NMM and select your color of preference. This version also fixes the missing torso on the male silver armor as well as the incorrect color showing up in the inventory screen for the red armor.

[i]1.0[/i]
Initial Release

[u]Installation:[/u]
[i]NMM[/i]
1. Download and install Sword13's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21181/]Battlemage Armor[/url].
2. Download your preferred color and activate!
3. Enjoy your new color in-game!

[i]Manual[/i]
1. Download and install Sword13's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21181/]Battlemage Armor[/url].
2. Click the "Download Manually" link for your preferred color.
3. Extract the contents of the compressed file into your Data/Textures/Armor/Destructmage directory and overwrite existing files.
4. Enjoy your new color in-game!

[u]Uninstall[/u]
[i]NMM[/i]
1. Deactivate mod in Mods list
2. Delete mod from list if you don't plan on using it again.

[i]Manual[/i]
1. Overwrite new files with files from original mod (or completely reinstall original mod)
- or -
2. Completely uninstall original mod including textures

[u]Future Plans:[/u]
I have no plans to do anything further with this particular re-color, however I do plan to attempt an HD retexture soon which will be released separately.

[u]Credits:[/u]
Sword13 for the original mod.
Bethesda for the game and assets.
Adobe for Photoshop CS4
Users for their support and downloads!
author: k4tonic
